text: all right, howard wolowitz, listen up. you sign anything she puts in front of you, because you are the luckiest man alive. if you let her go, there is no way you can find anyone else. speaking on behalf of all women, it is not gonna happen, we had a meeting. and you, a grown man fainting at the sight of a little blood.
